name: Miniwolf
description:
Summary

Miniwolf is a one-button golf game that was created by myself as a test project.

Try to score your best!

Controls:

  • Left mouse click - hold and release to shoot the ball
  • R - restart the game
  • Escape - exit the game
Credits

Multiple assets made by third-party artists were used in this project.

GFX:

  • Multi Platformer Tileset by Diego del Solar
  • m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen
  • Dinky Tiny Golf Asset Pack by Mike
  • Pixel Button Prompts by Retrocade Media
  • The Wolf Pack by Jason Perry

SFX:

  • Unimpressed Yay by xtrgamr
  • Ambient Field With Trees Afternoon by tferrino
